name: Stellar Converter
text:
Action: Choose 1 non-home planet other than Mecatol Rex in a system that contains or is adjacent to 1 or more of your units that have Bombardment; destroy all units on that planet and purge its attachments and its planet card.
Then, place the destroyed planet token on that planet and purge this card.

name: The Crown of Emphidia
text:
At the end of your turn, you may exhaust this card to explore 1 planet you control.
At the end of the status phase, if you control the "Tomb of Emphidia," you may purge this card to gain 1 victory point.

name: The Crown of Thalnos
text:
At the start of a combat round, you may exhaust this card to apply +1 to your unit's combat rolls during that combat round.
When rolling dice in combat, each result of 10 or higher (after modifiers) produces 1 extra hit.

name: Nanoforge
text:
Action: Attach this card to a non-legendary, non-home planet you control; ready the planet; its resource and influence values are increased by 2 and it is a legendary planet.
This action cannot be performed once attached.

name: The Prophet's Tears
text: When you research a technology, you may ignore 1 prerequisite or draw 1 action card.

name: Hyper Drive
text: Before you move units during a tactical action, you may purge this card. If you do, apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships and treat all your ships as if they had infinite capacity during this tactical action.

name: Reality Matrix
text: Action: Purge this card to look at each other player's secret objectives, action cards, and promissory notes.

name: Hero's Triumph
text: At the end of your turn, you may purge this card to score 1 public or secret objective if you fulfill its requirements.

name: The Vision of Elephar
text:
At the start of your turn, you may look at the top and bottom card of the action card deck or any exploration deck.
You may purge this card to draw one secret objective or 2 action cards.

name: The Siren's Call
text:
At any time, you may look at the top card of the Event deck.
At the start of your turn, you may purge this card to reveal the top 3 cards of the Event deck. Choose 1 to trigger; discard the others.

name: Galactic Precession
text: At the start of your turn, you may purge this card to remove any number of your ground forces from the game board and place them on planets you control or in the space area of systems that contain your ships with capacity.

name: The Voice of Arvid
text: At the start of the agenda phase, you may reveal the top 5 cards of the agenda deck. Choose 1 of the revealed agendas. Resolve it as if you had case 1 vote for an outcome of your choice; discard the rest.
